CustomField.description: If the total Transaction Fees do not exceed the Minimum Fee per annum, the Principal shall pay the difference between the total Transaction Fee for the preceding twelve (12) month period and the Minimum Fee, on each anniversary of the Commencement Date.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the total Transaction Fees do not exceed the Minimum Fee per annum, the Principal shall pay the difference between the total Transaction Fee for the preceding twelve (12) month period and the Minimum Fee, on each anniversary of the Commencement Date.
CustomField.label: Minimum Fees
